texts.Monitoring:Title: Monitoring
texts.Monitoring:Heading: Service endpoints
texts.Monitoring:Subheading: Manage the services that are monitored by the platform.
texts.Monitoring:CreateServiceDescription: Provide the connection details so the monitoring service can reach this endpoint.
texts.Monitoring:EditServiceDescription: Modify the configuration for how this endpoint is monitored.
texts.Monitoring:ServiceDetailsDescription: Review current status and configuration for this service.
texts.Monitoring:DeleteConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete '{0}'? This action cannot be undone.
texts.Monitoring:DeleteFailure: Failed to delete the service endpoint.
texts.Monitoring:HistoryPlaceholder: Status history will appear here once health checks have been executed.
texts.Monitoring:HistoryEmpty: No check history is available yet.
texts.Monitoring:RunCheckFailure: Failed to execute the health check.
texts.Monitoring:Table.Name: Name
texts.Monitoring:Table.Empty: No service endpoints have been created yet.
texts.Monitoring:Fields.Name: Name
texts.Monitoring:Fields.TargetPlaceholder: Enter the endpoint target (URL, host, etc.)
texts.Monitoring:TargetHint.Http: Provide a full URL that will be checked via HTTP(S).
texts.Monitoring:TargetHint.Api: Provide the base API URL or endpoint that should be called.
texts.Monitoring:TargetHint.Tcp: Provide the host and port (e.g. host:port) for the TCP service.
texts.Monitoring:Validation.Name.Length: The {0} field must be at most {1} characters.
texts.Monitoring:Validation.Description.Length: The {0} field must be at most {1} characters.
texts.Monitoring:Validation.Target.Length: The {0} field must be at most {1} characters.
texts.Monitoring:Validation.CheckIntervalSecon: The {0} field must be at least {1} seconds.
texts.Monitoring:Validation.TimeoutSeconds.Ran: The {0} field must be at least {1} seconds.
